name: breakfive
description:
During the reign of Emperor Chengzu Zhu Di, the capital was moved to Beiping, attracting envoys from across the world. However, on the crucial day of New Year's Break of the Fifth, Tang Ge, a captain of the Embroidered Uniform Guard, becomes entangled in a mysterious case.

Tang Ge faces a challenging and mysterious situation—colleagues mysteriously die, and foreign envoys inexplicably vanish, all pointing to an unknown undercurrent. In this adventure full of puzzles and challenges, you will join Tang Ge in the investigation, revealing hidden truths behind the case through different choices. It's a journey filled with mysteries and uncertainties, where each decision you make influences the direction of the story.

Game Features:
Immersive Story Experience: Delve deep into a historical world full of mysteries and challenges through captivating interactive videos.
Investigate with Captain Tang Ge: As Captain Tang Ge of the Embroidered Uniform Guard, you will face the mysterious deaths of colleagues and the disappearance of foreign envoys, all pointing to an unknown undercurrent. Make wise choices to reveal the truth.
Decision Impact on the Story: Every decision you make will influence the development of the story, breaking away from traditional linear narratives to create a unique storytelling experience.
